sentence.Network_cn: 我们的儿子刚刚从骑三轮车过渡到骑普通自行车.

sentence.Network_en: When unemployed, I went to drive a tricycle.
sentence.Network_cn: 我失业的时候就去拉三轮车.

sentence.Network_en: A little boy rode by on a tricycle.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个小男孩骑着三轮车过去了.

entry.tran: (通常指儿童骑的)三轮脚踏车
entry.def: A tricycle is a cycle with three wheels, two at the back and one at the front. Tricycles are usually ridden by children.

means.word_mean: 1. a vehicle with three wheels that is moved by foot pedals
